io.github.mywarp.mywarp.util.teleport

Class StrategicTeleportHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mywarp.mywarp.util.teleport.StrategicTeleportHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TeleportHandler

    public class StrategicTeleportHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements TeleportHandler
    Parses teleport positions against a PositionValidationCapability. If a valid position exists, the entity is teleported there. If no valid position exists, the teleport is canceled.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.github.mywarp.mywarp.util.teleport.TeleportHandler

        TeleportHandler.TeleportStatus

    • Constructor Summary

      StrategicTeleportHandler(Settings settings, Game game, PositionValidationCapability... strategies)
      Creates an instance that uses the given strategies to validate teleport positions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TeleportHandler.TeleportStatus teleport(LocalEntity entity, java.util.UUID worldIdentifier, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3d position, com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector2f rotation)
      Teleports the given entity to the given position on the world identified by the given worldIdentifier with the given rotation and returns an appropriate status.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StrategicTeleportHandler

        public StrategicTeleportHandler(Settings settings,
                                Game game,
                                PositionValidationCapability... strategies)
        Creates an instance that uses the given strategies to validate teleport positions.

        The strategies are evaluated in the order of the given elements until either a strategy returns no valid position or all strategies have evaluated the position. If a strategy returns an alternate position, following strategies will check this position opposed to the original one.

        Parameters:
        settings - the settings instance to use
        game - the game instance to use
        strategies - the strategies to use

      • StrategicTeleportHandler

        public StrategicTeleportHandler(Settings settings,
                                Game game,
                                java.lang.Iterable<PositionValidationCapability> strategies)
        Creates an instance that uses the given strategies to validate teleport positions.

        The strategies are evaluated in the order of the elements in the given Iterable until either a strategy returns no valid position or all strategies have evaluated the position. If a strategy returns an alternate position, following strategies will check this position opposed to the original one.

        Parameters:
        settings - the settings instance to use
        game - the game instance to use
        strategies - the strategies to use
